Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsWas outside cleaning a bird cought my attention and looked up to the sky and saw flying red objects that appeared to be falling. I first thought they were balloons but more appeared and began flashing following one another and hovering in one spot till they faded into the clear blue sky.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Perris
There were no other sightings in Perris on or around February 17th 2013
Summary: flashing red lights in clear blue sky
